Schedule for European Astronaut Selection
 
DatesStep in selection process
Mon 19/05/08 -
Wed 18/06/08		Application period with a valid medical certificate
July - August 2008

1st step of psychological testing, Hamburg

(1 day for each selected applicant)
September -
December 2008

2nd step of psychological testing, Cologne

(1 day for each selected applicant)
January -
February 2009

Medical testing, Toulouse or Cologne

(5 days for each selected applicant)
April/May 2009

Decision and appointment by DG
July 2009

Start of Basic Training
